main.commandNotFound: That's not a command that I understand, sorry!
parser.missingQuote: You're missing a quotation mark so I can't understand what you mean!
parser.parameterizedBeforeStandalone: Option `%(option)` requires parameter and cannot be before `%(flag)`
help.description: Mystia helps you with a command or lists all of them!
help.wikiExplanation: More information can be found on the wiki!
help.title: Mystia's Commands
avatar.description: Mystia fetches yours or someone else's profile picture!
avatar.noMentionedUsers: Of whom did you want me to find the avatar of? Please @mention them!
pick.description:
Mystia will help you pick something!
`-r --ranged`
`Pick from a numeric range instead. Requires two numeric inputs`
`-c --card`
`Pick a card from a standard 52-card deck`
pick.insufficientOptions: You must give me at least two options to pick from!
pick.nonNumericLimit: At least one limit is not an integer!
